plugin.name: recaptcha
plugin.author: Chad Johnston
plugin.title: ReCaptcha and Mailhide support for Grails.
plugin.description: Protect your website from spam and abuse while letting real people pass through with ease. This version supports the new "checkbox" CAPTCHA. If you want the old style CAPTCHA, use version 0.7.0. This plugin uses the ReCaptcha Java library available from http://code.google.com/p/recaptcha/.
